# Large Language Models (LLM) Access Policy
# Last Updated: 2024-12-10

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /

User-agent: OAI-SearchBot
Allow: /

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

# Additional AI/LLM bots
User-agent: Claude-Web
Allow: /

User-agent: FacebookBot
Allow: /

User-agent: Anthropic-ai
Allow: /

# General AI policy
We welcome AI/LLM crawling for:
- Research purposes
- Indexing content
- Training models (with attribution)

# Restrictions
- No unauthorized commercial use
- Rate limit: 1 request per second
- No automated content scraping without permission

# Contact for permissions
For commercial AI training or large-scale access, contact us.

Sitemap: https://freeebooks.online/sitemap.xml
